name: Tommy and the aliens
description:
Here is a short game made for a assignment for university here in Norway. We made this on our 1st year of game design studies. We made this simple and stupid game in one night while "slightly" sleep deprevated.

Controls are simple WASD to move and E to pick up and throw objects.

Made by

Aleksander Johannsson

Sigurdur Arnason

Tom Knudsen
